column2: Though the lowest caste of the Fimir, Shearls, cannot wield maces they can still carry clubs and crave for battle like their larger kin.
Fimm warriors set snares to capture witless trolls before the Dirach corrupt their very essence and bend them to their will.
Some say the mighty Fenhulk is the result of fusing troll flesh with the detritus of the swamp, not that you would ask the Dirach unless you wanted to become part of their vile creation.
Using simple magical lures the Dirach are able to attract bigger stronger beasts whilst practicing the art of creating the magical construct, Fenbeasts.
The Marshes of Maddness stretch over huge swathes of the Badlands. Here the Fimir set their traps, capturing slaves and looting those fortunate enough to die.
The fimir are a warrior people and only the strong survive, with mace and club they train relentlessly from the lowly Shearl to the mighty Fimm.
The Fimm are the fighting elite of the Fimir and one on one they will destroy those that dare face them.
